modName: Craftable Enchantable Armored Amulets of Skyrim
summary: This mod allow you to craft and enchant all the amulets of Skyrim vanilla. Each comes in 4 differents version. (Enchanted original, clothing, heavy and light armor)
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b]DETAILS
[/b][size=2][color=#ff0000][i][b]This mod allow you[/b][/i][/color]
[/size][/size][size=3][size=2][size=3][size=2][size=3][size=2]﻿• [/size][/size][/size][/size]to craft the [b]enchanted[/b] amulets of the Nine Divines + enchanted Gauldur's amulet + enchanted Necromancer amulet + enchanted amulet of Articulation
[b]But also[/b]
[/size][/size][size=3][size=2][size=3][size=2][size=3][size=2][size=3][size=2]﻿• [/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size]to craft all the amulets of skyrim as an unenchanted version. Then you can apply the enchant that you want
[b]And also[/b]
[/size][/size][size=3][size=2][size=3][size=2][size=3][size=2][size=3][size=2]﻿• [/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size]to craft them in clothing, light armor and heavy armor version[/size][b]
[size=2]Also to finish
[/size][/b][/size][size=3][size=2][size=3][size=2]﻿• [/size][/size]weight of all amulets are now 0.2 instead of 1.0[/size][b][size=2] ! Who wear a necklace of 1 kilo? ....... except Mr-T :)[/size]
[/b][size=2]﻿• Light armor value = 8 [size=1](it's the original armor value of the "Amulet of Articulation")[/size]
﻿﻿• Heavy armor value = 10[/size][b]

REQUIERED
[/b][size=2] Only [b]SKYRIM[/b][/size][size=2] for now [size=1](I plan to expand the mod to DLC soon. There's some nice amulets in Dawnguard and Dragonborn too)[/size][/size][size=1][b]
[/b][/size][b]
OBTAIN[/b][/size]
﻿Due the high numb[size=2]er of amulet[/size]s (51) and for not flood your jewelry crafting menu,[b]
[i][color=#ff0000] ﻿you need to have the book "The forging of divine amulets"[/color][color=#ff0000] in your inventory[/color][/i][/b] to be able to craft them.
﻿The book can be obtained from[i] [b]Lucan Valerius[/b][/i] in Riverwood and[i] [b]Farengar Secret Fire[/b][/i] in Dragonsearch for 25 gold.

﻿You can also use the console
﻿ ﻿help forging [size=1](to obtain ID of the book)[/size]
﻿ ﻿help amulet [size=1](to obtain ID's of amulets)[/size]
﻿
When you have the book in your inventory, all amulets
﻿ ﻿• Can be crafted at any forge under jewelery section
﻿ ﻿• Comes in [i][b]4 differents version*[/b][/i] :[size=2] enchanted original, clothing, light armor and heavy armor[/size]
([size=1]*except amulet of the Elder Council who comes in only 3 versions because there's no associate [size=1]enchantment [/size] for this amulet)[/size]
﻿ ﻿• Can be tempered at workbench table [size=1](for the light and heavy armor version + Original version of Amulet of Articulation)[/size]
﻿ ﻿• Can be Enchanted like any other necklace

[size=3][b]INSTALL[/b][/size]
﻿• Use NMM
﻿or
﻿• Manual install : Put TheAmuletOfSkyrim.esp in your data directory and check if it's selected before launching your game.

﻿Feel free to endorse, comment or report any bug

[b][size=3]INFO[/size][/b]
﻿• ﻿﻿I'm using a french version of Skyrim so please repport me if some text still appear in french. Thank y[size=2]ou[/size][size=3][size=2] [/size][/size][size=3][size=2]
